meanings.definition: Having a streaked or mottled appearance resembling marble.
meanings.sent2: The marbled paper had a unique design.
meanings.sent3: The marbled scarf added a touch of elegance to her outfit.
meanings.sent4: The marbled sky at sunset was a breathtaking sight.
meanings.sent5: The marbled effect on the wall made the room feel luxurious.

meanings.definition: Made or decorated with a pattern resembling marble.
meanings.sent1: She wore a marbled necklace that matched her dress.
meanings.sent2: The marbled floor in the hallway was stunning.
meanings.sent3: The marbled phone case was a stylish accessory.
meanings.sent4: The marbled statue in the garden looked lifelike.
meanings.sent5: The marbled countertop in the kitchen was easy to clean.

meanings.definition: To streak or mottle with different colors or shades.
meanings.sent1: She marbled the paper with various paints.
meanings.sent2: The artist marbled the canvas to create a unique effect.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally marbled his shirt while painting.
meanings.sent4: The chef marbled the cake batter for a swirl effect.
meanings.sent5: They decided to marble the walls for a modern look.
